thread.title: Donald Trump to Host Saturday Night Live
thread.title_full: Donald Trump to Host Saturday Night Live

author: TV Guide
title: Donald Trump to Host Saturday Night Live
text: Donald Trump to Host Saturday Night Live Donald Trump will bring his notorious comedy stylings to ... Posted Oct. 13, 2015 at 3:37 PM Updated at 5:40 PM Posted Oct. 13, 2015 at 3:37 PM Updated at 5:40 PM Donald Trump will bring his notorious comedy stylings to Saturday Night Live on Nov. 7, NBC announced Tuesday. The network previously severed ties with the Republican presidential frontrunner over his derogatory remarks made about Mexican immigrants. But while NBC fired Trump from The Apprentice , it seems it's more than happy to reap the ratings rewards of having him on the network. Only last month, Trump appeared on The Tonight Show. For his part, Trump claimed it was his decision to end his relationship with NBC. Trump will be joined for his second SNL hosting gig by Sia , who will be that week's musical guest.
